mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select num, writer, subject, regdate, readcount, ref, re_step, re_level, content,filename,filesize from board2 order by ref desc, re_step) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update board2 set re_step=re_step+1 " where ref=#{ref} and re_step> #{re_step}
mapper.insert: insert into board2(num, writer, subject, regdate, ref, re_step, re_level, content, filename, filesize) values(#{num},#{writer},#{subject}, sysdate, #{ref},#{re_step},#{re_level},#{content},#{filename},#{filesize})
mapper.update: update board2 set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
update board2 set subject=#{subject},content=#{content} where num=#{num}
